entry.title: New release for Nautical Backup: v2.6.15
entry.content:

entry.title: New release for Nautical Backup: v2.7.0
entry.content:
Additional folders date format

To enable the Dated Destination folder syntax for Global Additional folders (not folders tied to containers), then use this variable.

Default: false (use the base destination folder)

properties ADDITIONAL_FOLDERS_USE_DEST_DATE_FOLDER=true

What's Changed

  • Update minituff/nautical-backup Docker tag to v2.6.17 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/364
  • Fix additional folders and dated folder by @Minituff in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/367

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/compare/v2.6.17...v2.7.0
